HomePage.Feature1Text: Build applications for multiple platforms with ready to use features, servers and User Interface. It increase significantly the productivity.
HomePage.Feature2Text: Offline-first React apps with CSS in JS for the front-end backed by AI on a distributed and shared platform of services, servers and microservices.
HomePage.Feature3Text: With best practices applied in ergonomics, interactions, usability and accessibility. Available out of the box and customizable.
HomePage.headerSubTitle: For web, mobile & desktop from design principles to production
HomePage.metaDescription: Modular infrastructure to build applications. For web, iOs, Android and desktop with a complete set of tools from design principles to production.
HomePage.receiveNews: I would like to receive news about Ceacle Modo.
HomePage.onInviteOnlySub:
By subscribing you might get an invite. 
And you will know when we open source it.
components-ceacle.ServicesList.briefDesc: Start your projects the right way
